meanings.sent1: After swimming, some people experience otalgias due to water trapped in their ears.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed ear drops to relieve the otalgias the patient was suffering from.
meanings.sent3: The otalgias were so bothersome that the child couldn't concentrate on their homework.
meanings.sent4: The otalgias felt like tiny elves were tap-dancing inside the person's ears.
meanings.sent5: The sharp otalgias made it feel like tiny needles were poking the ear drums.
